segments.text: This entire scene is making my blood boil a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so completely unaware of her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing like a waterfall, right onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's literally standing in a growing puddle, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, those children are engaged in outright thievery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that rickety stool, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for disaster on multiple fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and take control of this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these hazards are just piling up, unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury or significant damage is really high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch such preventable problems unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the level of distraction displayed here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen is on the brink of absolute chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really grates on my nerves to see such a mess developing.
segments.speaker: PAR
